name: Memories (itch) (1tsTheLuffy)
description:
Where am I ?  Who am I ?  Why I don't remember anything?

She's trapped and don't remember anything, but you can help her.

Controls: Arrow keys for movement.  Press "Z" for short jump and hold for long jump.

Press "Z" while on wall to do a wall jump and with arrow keys do a side wall jump

"R" to restart.

If it Game play hangs on browser, please download and play.

Software: Unity engine, visual studio, aseprite, bosca ceoil, audacity.

ENJOY!!
